casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

October 25, 2010

[Cite as 10/25/2010 Case Announcements #2, 2010-Ohio-5197.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2010-1641. State ex rel. McCaffrey v. Mahoning Cty. Bd. of Commrs.

In Mandamus. This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for a writ of mandamus. Upon consideration of respondents’ motion to stay the case pending mediation,

It is ordered by the court that the motion to stay is granted and a new due date will be set for the filing of an answer if the case is returned from mediation.
